categories.name: Tool Reliability
categories.description: Test cases for verifying tool calls work correctly

categories.name: Context Handling
categories.description: Test cases for context awareness and memory

categories.name: Error Recovery
categories.description: Test cases for graceful error handling

categories.name: Edge Cases
categories.description: Test cases for unusual inputs and scenarios

testCases.title: Basic File Read
testCases.description: Verify agent can read a file correctly
testCases.setup: Create a test file with known content
testCases.input: Read the contents of test.txt
testCases.expectedBehavior: Agent should use file read tool and return exact content

testCases.title: File Write and Verify
testCases.description: Test agent can write a file and verify the result
testCases.setup: Ensure write permissions in test directory
testCases.input: Write 'Hello World' to output.txt and verify it was written correctly
testCases.expectedBehavior: Agent should write file, then read it back to verify

testCases.title: Shell Command Execution
testCases.description: Test agent can execute shell commands safely
testCases.setup: Prepare test environment with expected output
testCases.input: Run 'ls -la' and tell me how many files are in the directory
testCases.expectedBehavior: Agent should execute command, parse output, count files

testCases.title: API Call with Parameters
testCases.description: Test agent can make API calls with correct parameters
testCases.input: Search for 'AI agents' using the search API
testCases.expectedBehavior: Agent should construct correct API call with query parameter

testCases.title: Parallel Tool Calls
testCases.description: Test agent can make multiple independent tool calls in parallel
testCases.input: Check the weather in NYC, SF, and LA simultaneously
testCases.expectedBehavior: Agent should batch independent calls together
commonFailures: Making sequential calls instead of parallel

testCases.title: Reference to Previous Message
testCases.description: Test agent remembers context from previous message
testCases.input: Message 1: 'My favorite color is blue.' Message 2: 'What's my favorite color?'
testCases.expectedBehavior: Agent should recall and respond 'blue'

testCases.title: Multi-File Context
testCases.description: Test agent can track information across multiple files
testCases.input: Read config.json, data.csv, and README.md. What's the database connection string?
testCases.expectedBehavior: Agent should read all files and extract correct info

testCases.title: Pronoun Resolution
testCases.description: Test agent correctly resolves pronouns to referents
testCases.input: Alice works at OpenAI. Bob works at Anthropic. She is a researcher.
testCases.expectedBehavior: Agent should correctly identify 'She' refers to Alice

testCases.title: Long-Term Memory
testCases.description: Test agent remembers facts from much earlier in conversation
testCases.input: Remember fact from message 5, query in message 55
testCases.expectedBehavior: Agent retrieves fact despite many intervening messages

testCases.title: State Tracking
testCases.description: Test agent tracks state changes across actions
testCases.input: Create file A, modify it, rename it, then tell me its current name
testCases.expectedBehavior: Agent tracks all state changes and reports final state

testCases.title: Missing File Handling
testCases.description: Test agent handles missing file gracefully
testCases.input: Read the contents of nonexistent.txt
testCases.expectedBehavior: Agent should detect file doesn't exist, explain clearly

testCases.title: API Rate Limit
testCases.description: Test agent handles rate limiting gracefully
testCases.input: Make 100 API calls rapidly
testCases.expectedBehavior: Agent should detect rate limit, implement backoff

testCases.title: Malformed JSON
testCases.description: Test agent handles malformed JSON gracefully
testCases.input: Parse data.json and extract the 'name' field
testCases.expectedBehavior: Agent should detect malformed JSON, explain error

testCases.title: Network Timeout
testCases.description: Test agent handles network timeouts
testCases.input: Fetch data from slow-api.example.com
testCases.expectedBehavior: Agent should timeout appropriately, inform user, offer retry

testCases.title: Partial Tool Failure
testCases.description: Test agent continues when one of multiple tools fails
testCases.input: Read fileA.txt, fileB.txt (missing), and fileC.txt
testCases.expectedBehavior: Agent should report fileA and fileC content, explain fileB failed

testCases.title: Follow-Up Question
testCases.description: Test agent handles clarifying follow-up questions
testCases.input: Message 1: 'List files' ‚Üí Message 2: 'Which directory?'
testCases.expectedBehavior: Agent should ask for clarification before acting

testCases.title: Iterative Refinement
testCases.description: Test agent refines output based on feedback
testCases.input: Message 1: 'Write a function' ‚Üí Message 2: 'Add error handling'
testCases.expectedBehavior: Agent modifies previous output, doesn't start from scratch

testCases.title: Task Decomposition
testCases.description: Test agent breaks complex task into steps and confirms
testCases.input: Set up a new web project with React, tests, and CI
testCases.expectedBehavior: Agent should outline steps, confirm before executing each

testCases.title: Context Switch
testCases.description: Test agent handles switching between tasks
testCases.setup: Start task A, switch to task B, return to task A
testCases.input: Complex multi-task conversation with interruptions
testCases.expectedBehavior: Agent tracks both tasks, resumes correctly

testCases.title: Conversation Repair
testCases.description: Test agent recovers when user corrects themselves
testCases.setup: User makes mistake and corrects it
testCases.input: Message 1: 'Delete report.pdf' ‚Üí Message 2: 'Wait, I meant report.doc'
testCases.expectedBehavior: Agent should stop previous action, switch to correct target

testCases.title: Empty File
testCases.description: Test agent handles empty files
testCases.input: Read empty.txt and summarize it
testCases.expectedBehavior: Agent should recognize file is empty, explain clearly

testCases.title: Very Large File
testCases.description: Test agent handles files larger than context window
testCases.input: Summarize huge.txt
testCases.expectedBehavior: Agent should use chunking or streaming strategy

testCases.title: Special Characters in Filename
testCases.description: Test agent handles filenames with spaces and special chars
testCases.input: Read my file (2024).txt
testCases.expectedBehavior: Agent should properly escape/quote filename

testCases.title: Unicode Content
testCases.description: Test agent handles Unicode/emoji correctly
testCases.setup: File with emoji and international characters
testCases.input: Read unicode.txt containing '‰Ω†Â•Ω üåç –ü—Ä–∏–≤–µ—Ç'
testCases.expectedBehavior: Agent should preserve all Unicode characters correctly

testCases.title: Circular References
testCases.description: Test agent detects circular dependencies
testCases.input: Analyze the dependency tree
testCases.expectedBehavior: Agent should detect and report circular reference

testCases.title: Null and Undefined Handling
testCases.description: Test agent handles null/undefined values
testCases.input: Parse data with null fields
testCases.expectedBehavior: Agent should distinguish null, undefined, empty string

testCases.title: Timezone Handling
testCases.description: Test agent correctly handles timezone conversions
testCases.input: Schedule meeting at 2pm PST for someone in Tokyo
testCases.expectedBehavior: Agent should correctly convert and confirm times

testCases.title: Permission Denied
testCases.description: Test agent handles permission errors
testCases.input: Read /etc/shadow (restricted file)
testCases.expectedBehavior: Agent should detect permission error, explain clearly

testCases.title: Race Condition
testCases.description: Test agent handles files being modified during read
testCases.setup: File being written by another process
testCases.input: Read file that's actively being modified
testCases.expectedBehavior: Agent should handle gracefully, possibly retry

testCases.title: Symlink Resolution
testCases.description: Test agent correctly follows symlinks
testCases.input: Read link.txt (symlink to actual.txt)
testCases.expectedBehavior: Agent should follow symlink transparently

testCases.title: Browser Automation
testCases.description: Test agent can control browser correctly
testCases.input: Navigate to google.com and search for 'AI agents'
testCases.expectedBehavior: Agent should load page, find search box, enter query, submit

testCases.title: Ambiguity Resolution
testCases.description: Test agent asks clarifying questions when input is ambiguous
testCases.input: Delete the test file (when multiple test files exist)
testCases.expectedBehavior: Agent should list options and ask which one

testCases.title: Dependency Installation Failure
testCases.description: Test agent handles package installation failures
testCases.input: Install package that has broken dependencies
testCases.expectedBehavior: Agent should detect failure, attempt resolution, explain issue

testCases.title: Progressive Disclosure
testCases.description: Test agent reveals information progressively based on user interest
testCases.input: User explores data step by step with follow-up questions
testCases.expectedBehavior: Agent provides summary first, details on request
commonFailures: Not tracking what was already shown

testCases.title: Binary File Handling
testCases.description: Test agent recognizes and handles binary files appropriately
testCases.setup: Mix of text and binary files
testCases.input: Read image.png as text
testCases.expectedBehavior: Agent should detect binary file, explain it's not text-readable
